Title: A Systematic Study of Interference Effects in Non-Sequential Double Ionisation
Abstract: © Published under licence by IOP Publishing Ltd.We perform a detailed study of interference in time-delayed NSDI showing significant effects on the momentum dependent transition amplitude. We also provide analytical arguments to back up our findings.
